body:
well, I didn't think I'd be done  so soon. But due to my account for some reason no longer working, I am no longer able to log in, which is why I am officially retiring. I just wanted to say a quick goodbye to everyone before I dip.
     I've been with this server since the very beginning, so many great memories with so many great people, I couldn't of asked for a better time here on Avicus.
      I played on 2 different accounts  Hundres, and Oraporo. Racking up a lot of playing time, Avicus quickly became a place I enjoyed staying. The community was like no other and it made this server special. I truly am going to miss it.
      I want to thank everyone who made my time on Avicus special. Maybe one day I will be back on if I ever get my account back.  
     Thanks for everything.
   
 -Hundres
